programme.title: Blood Brothers
programme.desc: Nicola Bellizzi returns to Naples, after spending six years in a juvenile detention centre, determined to get out of his outcast status and become a lawyer. In the neighbourhood, Gaetano, known as Core e' Fierro, is the absolute boss of the guapperia. A clash takes place between the two young men; but the behaviour of Nicola, who defends Gaetano from the commissioner Ajossa who has caught them duelling, gives rise to a deep friendship between the two. After many denials, driven by necessity, Nicola agrees to become a guappo in turn during an initiation at the secret court to which he is introduced by Core e' Fierro. Lucia, Gaetano's woman, feels attracted to Nicola, but the two repress their desire. Ajossa wants to get his hands on Gaetano and sets a trap for Lucia, inducing her to yield to him in order to save her lover, so that the latter, in order to avenge the offence, will make a mistake.

programme.title: Appassionata
programme.desc: A passionate and forbidden love story that unfolds between two characters from different walks of life.

programme.title: Youtopia
programme.desc: A young woman faces moral dilemmas and hardship in a poignant story of hope and despair.

programme.title: Sign of the gladiator
programme.desc: Zenobia, Queen of Palmyra, defies Roman rule, leading to war, betrayal, and a legendary love story.

programme.title: Scalps
programme.desc: The commander of a Texan fort in the Civil War tries to buy the local Indian tribe chief's daughter. The noble squaw manages to escape, and hides out with a rough rancher, who dislikes Indians, but hates the Southerners more.

programme.title: Super Fuzz
programme.desc: Policeman Dave Speed is not like any other policeman: as a result of an atomic explosion he acquired superpowers, which he uses to fight crime. However, his super strength has limits: the colour red nullifies his extraordinary abilities...

programme.title: Daitona
programme.desc: Daitona follows a thrilling journey of survival as its characters face high-speed danger and treachery.

programme.title: Crime of Love
programme.desc: The beautiful Carmela, a girl of Sicilian descent who arrived in the North with her parents, falls in love with the Milanese Nullo, a work colleague. But their relationship must come to terms with the difference in the two's views: he is of anarchist ideas while she is deeply religious.

programme.title: Confessions of a lady cop
programme.desc: A young woman rises through the ranks of the police force while navigating personal challenges.

programme.title: Provocation
programme.desc: Vanessa, widowed at a young age, lives with her step-daughters Kikki and Vivi in a luxurious villa on the island of San Pietro. They have recently moved in with Roberto, a professor and former lover of Vanessa's, who is in charge of giving private lessons to the two girls in preparation for their high school exams. Inside the mansion there is constant tension, a climate of hatred in which the man will become involved despite himself with increasingly tragic consequences.

programme.desc: The commander of a Texan fort in the Civil War tries to buy the local Indian tribe chief's daughter. The noble squaw manages to escape, and hides out with a rough rancher, who dislikes Indians, but hates the Southerners more.
